body.p:
Hon B. Magoffin, Gov. of Kentucky --
Dear Sir: --

Some 12 months ago E. Vinson Jr, a citizen of Our County, was fine fifty dollars for giving a slave spiritous Liquors, said fine was respited 12 months by your honor, and we now pray you to remit said fine altogether. Vinson is a poor man, and wholly unable to pay said fine --

Thomas Nichols
